item.description:
Join TMIRCE, Tracy, and the crew from Vibram Five Fingers store (at 292 Newbury St) to do a trail run in the fells.

We may do one or two loops depending on the size of the group and how far everyone feels like running. Don't have Vibram Five Fingers? Don't worry, run in whatever you want. May even have a bit of leaf peeping if the trees still have some color to them.


Get down and chill with us in the parking lot for post run, tailgate style, breakfast.

We are planning on meeting at the Vibram Store at 8:30am, and carpooling to the Sheepfold parking lot. If you are not going to join the car pool, meet at the sheepfold parking lot at 9:00am.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll look like a bunch of runners.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE + Vibram (the store) + Trails = Awesome Sunday Run!
